nodes.text: Mol was a female lieutenant of the Galactic Republic at the time of the Galactic War. During the Conquest of Makeb, she was stationed on Keylander Station, and specialized as a supply officer for fellow Republic troopers. She was later transferred to the moon CZ-198 during the Seizure of CZ-198.
She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
